00002 #define _WIFI_MESH_MACROS_H

00004 #include "Status.h"

00006 #define SAFE_OPERATION(operation)                               do {operation;} while (0)
00007 #define ROUND(x)                                                                (long)((x) + 0.5)
00008 
00009 #define VALIDATE(condition, error)                              SAFE_OPERATION(if (!(condition)) return (error))
00010 #define VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(condition)                   VALIDATE(condition, eSTATUS_COMMON_INVALID_ARGUMENT)
00011 
00012 #define ARRAY_SIZE(size)                                                ((size.x) * (size.y))
00013 #define ARRAY_BYTE_SIZE(type, size)                             (sizeof(type) * ARRAY_SIZE(size))
00014 
00015 #define CLEAR(var)                                                              SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(*var)))
00016 #define CLEAR_ARRAY(var, size)                                  SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(var[0]) * ARRAY_SIZE(size)))
00017 
00018 #define NEW(type)                                                               (type*)(malloc(sizeof(type)))
00019 #define NEW_ARRAY(type, size)                                   (type*)(malloc(ARRAY_BYTE_SIZE(type, size)))
00020 
00021 #define DELETE(ptr)                                                             SAFE_OPERATION(free(ptr); ptr = NULL)
00022 
00023 #define CHECK_STATUS(rc)                                                SAFE_OPERATION(if ((rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (rc))
00024 #define CHECK_STATUS_BREAK(rc)                                  {if ((rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) break;}
00025 
00026 #define GET_MEMBER(destination, ptr, member)    SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr && destination); *destination = ptr->member; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)
00027 #define SET_MEMBER(source, ptr, member)                 SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr); ptr->member = source; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)
00028 
00029 #define CONSTRUCT(pptr, type, cond)                             SAFE_OPERATION \
00030                                                                                                 ( \
00031                                                                                                         VALIDATE(pptr && cond, eSTATUS_COMMON_INVALID_ARGUMENT); \
00032                                                                                                         *pptr = NEW(type); \
00033                                                                                                         VALIDATE(*pptr, eSTATUS_COMMON_NO_MEMORY); \
00034                                                                                                 )
00035 
00036 typedef enum { FALSE, TRUE } Boolean;
